about_the_game:
This demo is for showcasing the main features of the full release in Fall 2023. To find out more about POI: VR Dance, hear our development story, and contribute to our crowdfunding campaign, please visit: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/paracosmstudio/poi-vr-dance

Please be aware that the demo is not fully optimized for all hardware at this stage so there may be some performance issues upon enabling certain heavy effects.

Introducing a one-of-a-kind VR experience, POI: VR Dance game! Step into the captivating world of Poi dancing, where you can do the intricate movements of this beautiful art form, all from the comfort of your own home. With immersive and intuitive controls, you will feel as though you are truly in the midst of a live Poi dance performance of your own. Practice and perfect your moves in a stunning virtual environment with breathtaking visuals and music that will transport you to another realm. Whether you're a seasoned dancer or a beginner, POI: VR Dance is the perfect way to explore and appreciate the art of Poi dancing in a whole new way. So what are you waiting for? Grab your VR headset and get ready to dance!

Your feedback & support means the world to us :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel 6-Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR, Oculus
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
